answers.answer: Doesn't necessarily mean you will have a large baby your due date could be off ot it could just be the way your baby is laying in the womb.
Im 31 weeks and they think im going to have another big baby too, bt my first was over 10lbs so that could be why too.
Omg how was the process on your first baby?  Im a ftm so I don't know what to expect

At around 30 weeks with my son they told me Ayden was measuring around 34 weeks. At 36 weeks they told me that my son was going to be 12 pounds. Ayden was born July 25th weighing at 8.6 pounds and 21 inches long. My daughter is measuring at 23 weeks but I am 22. So dont be worried if  your baby is measuring bigger than he or she is supposed to be. That just means that he or she is healthy.
Have yall been diagnosed with gestational diabetes?  They said since I have that the baby is gunna be big.  And I might have her early

I was told the same thing. I'm 36weeks and I was measured 40 weeks. They asked how much I weighed when I was born. Sometimes the genes in our family can pass on and my husband comes from a family where they are tall or just huge people. Going in for ultrasound next week to find out if its the baby who is big or im just having a lot of amniotic fluid inside. .

The process was harsh, i mean i have two kids and my ten lb baby was the worst labour, and i felt it all. I didnt have to have a c.section thank god and i only tore a little bit not much, everyone thinks im the trooper outta my family lol. Bt i was over due a week and they had no idea my baby was so big, so really its jst an estimate when they say how big your baby is measuring. I jst hope i dnt have another ten lb baby haha.
My mom had GD with me and I was under 7 lbs. Just because you have doesnt necessarily mean baby is going to be big either.

question: Has anyone been told they are going to have a large baby?  Im currently 29 weeks and the baby is reading 31 weeks.
title: large baby
